Santosh: Use either path from const or config.
Spelling
Use path from const or config.
Seeing as this is not really going to be used by the op vpd parser app, please just pass in a default string here.
Done

This seems unnecessary to do inside this function and adds an undesirable dependency on the format of the exception string. Please revert this change here and instead add it at the call site as needed.
Ack
This has gotten quite ugly, tbh. We should think about removing it.
We can have a TBD or I can log an issue to track in our downstream repo.
Why did the const qualifier need to be removed?
As in some cases we are modifying objPath in updateKeyword api.
